meta.job_title: IBM COGNOS TM1 LEAD / PRINCIPAL CONSULTANT

duties_responsibilities.duty: Work with business stakeholders to elicit and document planning and analytics business requirements.
Formulate best practice strategies, principles, and guidelines for TM1, ensuring compliance with future development.
Develop and quality assure TM1 applications, directing the work of multiple TM1 developers and third-party providers.
Create and maintain technical and administrative documentation for TM1 applications.
Provide training to end-users and transfer knowledge to the business support function.
Act as the expert trouble-shooter for issues that the helpdesk is unable to resolve.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field (Master's preferred)
